alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 8:30PM MST until December 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and Blowing Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Northwesterly winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Colorado, northwest and west central Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Travel on area roadways overnight is not recommended. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will lower slightly through the evening hours. Blizzard conditions may still occur at times but should be intermittent if they do occur.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County
